home.description: Web Developer focused on building modern and responsive websites. I work with WordPress and develop my own web systems.

paragraphs: Hi! I'm Tomek – a Junior Web Developer. I graduated from a technical high school with a specialization in IT and later obtained qualifications as a programming technician. I am currently developing my skills by studying Computer Science at Collegium Da Vinci.

I am interested in building websites, mainly based on WordPress. I also develop my own web systems, which allows me to better understand how applications work and how to design functional and well-thought-out solutions.
I am looking for opportunities to further develop as a Web Developer, gain hands-on experience, and have a real impact on project development.

educationList.institution: Zespół szkół technicznych im. Noblistów Polskich, Trzcianka

jobs.description: My responsibilities include graphic design using CorelDRAW as well as technical support, including diagnosing and resolving issues related to computer hardware and network infrastructure.

I was responsible for customer support and diagnosing and repairing issues related to computers, laptops, and mobile devices. I also worked on building computer networks for retail stores, system installation and configuration, and assembling computer hardware.

I handled customer support and troubleshooting hardware and software issues for computers, laptops, and phones. Additionally, I assisted with network setup, system configuration, and computer assembly to ensure reliable hardware performance.
